segment.source: How to Change Import Search Paths
segment.target: How to Change Import Search Paths

segment.source: How to Change Import Search Paths
segment.target: How to Change Import Search Paths

segment.source: How to Change Import Search Paths
segment.target: How to Change Import Search Paths

segment.source: You can use the following procedure to change the import search path directly from the Application Virtualization node in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.
segment.target: You can use the following procedure to change the import search path directly from the Application Virtualization node in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.

segment.source: The import search path is used by the client to find the SFT file when you use the console to import an SFT file.
segment.target: The import search path is used by the client to find the SFT file when you use the console to import an SFT file.

segment.source: If it can find the file in this search path, it will not need to prompt you for a path.
segment.target: If it can find the file in this search path, it will not need to prompt you for a path.

segment.source: To change the import search path
segment.target: To change the import search path

segment.source: Right-click the Application Virtualization node, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.
segment.target: Right-click the Application Virtualization node, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.

segment.source: On the Import Search Path tab in the Properties dialog box, click Add to display a standard Browse dialog box and browse to the desired location.
segment.target: On the Import Search Path tab in the Properties dialog box, click Add to display a standard Browse dialog box and browse to the desired location.

segment.source: Highlight a path, and click Remove to delete this path.
segment.target: Highlight a path, and click Remove to delete this path.

segment.source: Use the Move Up and Move Down buttons to control the order in which the paths will be searched.
segment.target: Use the Move Up and Move Down buttons to control the order in which the paths will be searched.

segment.source: Click OK or Apply to change the setting.
segment.target: Click OK or Apply to change the setting.

segment.source: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console
